title: MFW I see people complain about champions
body:
http://s3.amazonaws.com/kym-assets/photos/images/original/000/128/343/1306699190001.jpg?1306720254

But, to further elaborate, SPECIFICALLY When people complain about champions that are easily counterable by in-game mechanics (Like Azir being mechanically counterable by playing as a marksman or playing as any champ that has alot of MS, or when people complain about Teemo when anyone smart enough to buy a fucking sweeping lens can make bank off his shrooms)

And when people complain about champs for being TOO OP, It just makes me mentally cringe on how bad they must be to think that {{champion:45}} {{champion:112}} {{champion:37}} and {{champion:30}} are all equally playable in mid lane, and that they should be nerfed because you let the fucking veigar farm to 800+ AP, and then didnt buy any fucking MR.
 
like seriously guys, git gud.
